code: import'./App.css';import React from'react';import{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[input,setInput]=useState('');const[title,setTitle]=useState('input');function handleChange(e,target){setInput(e.target.value);}function button(){setTitle(input);}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"App",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("header",{className:"App-header",children:title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"Body",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{height:" 2em"}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{placeholder:"text",onChange:e=>handleChange(e,"text"),style:{width:"50em",height:"250px",fontSize:"15px",background:"#282c34"}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{height:"5px"}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>button(),style:{height:"3em",width:"15em",fontSize:"30px",background:"#282c34"},children:"add"})]})]});}export default App;
